title: Ep 34 | Surviving Bear Attacks and Recognizing Kingdom People
description:
If a bear attacks: Jase compares what the Humane Society says to do and what he'd do. The guys also discuss how to recognize kingdom people. Al and Jase give a few examples from when they were in other countries doing mission work.
